page.syntax: Position as N = word_num(C cString ,C cWord )

argument.name: Position
argument.description: The position of the word in the list. Returns 0 if not found.

argument.name: cString
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of words or entries.

argument.name: cWord
argument.description: The word or entry to find in List.

page.description: Returns what word number cWord is in CR-LF delimited cString
page.discussion: The WORD_NUM() function returns the position of a word or entry in a CR-LF delimited list.
page.example: dim s as C s = <<%a% bird cow chicken goat %a% ? word_num(s, "chicken") = 3 ? word_num(s, "rooster") = 0
